document_data.mainbody:
Dottee was a teamsters wife in Hillsfar in the Moonsea in the late 15 century DR.
Circa 1486 DR, Dottee announced to Wittel that she was pregnant and they decided to go for a trip in the Cormanthor forest. There, a family of jackalweres ambushed them Wittel was left unconscious and Dottee taken.
